title: Patient Management
description: Complete patient profiles with medical history, appointments, and treatment plans all in one place.

title: 24/7 Access
description: Access your complete medical history anytime, anywhere. Perfect for emergencies, travel, or routine healthcare visits.

title: Doctor Access Control
description: Role-based permissions ensure only authorized healthcare professionals can access sensitive patient data.

title: Mobile Ready
description: Full functionality on any device. View test results

title: Complete Medical History
description: Comprehensive record keeping including medications, allergies, procedures, and test results in one secure location.

title: Smart Organization
description: AI-powered categorization and search makes finding specific medical information quick and intuitive.
